Title: Forex trading in Nigeria expands as market liquidity and access improve
Summary: Nigeria’s currency market is changing fast . Liquidity is deeper across key sessions, platforms are easier to reach on mobile, and more traders can fund and withdraw with less friction . These shifts are pulling new participants into the market .

Title: Lagos opens parks for free entry over Christmas period
Summary: LASPARK has announced free access to all state-managed parks for residents and visitors over a three-day Christmas period . Residents and visitors will be able to access parks for free entry over the festive period .

Title: I’ve stopped impregnating women anyhow – 2Baba
Summary: Innocent Idibia, popularly known as 2Baba, has said he has stopped impregnating women anyhow . The veteran Nigerian singer made the statement recently during the MC EdoPikin Undiluted with the singer .

Title: Makinde increases gratuity payment of retirees from N1.5b to N3b
Summary: Oyo State Governor, Engr. Seyi Makinde, has approved a 100 per cent increase in gratuity payments for retirees in the state . The Secretary of the Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC), Aribatise Adebayo, confirmed the development .

Title: Israel officially recognises Somaliland as sovereign state
Summary: Israel formally recognises Somaliland as an "independent and sovereign state" and signed an agreement to establish diplomatic ties . Israel on Friday formally recognised the "independent" and "sovereign" state .

Title: US airstrikes: Terrorists, sponsors nationwide should be targeted – Middle Belt Forum
Summary: The forum urged that the military offensive be extended to other parts of the country . Terrorists, sponsors nationwide should be targeted – Middle Belt Forum .

Title: Liverpool boss Slot says Ekitike reaping rewards for greater physicality
Summary: Liverpool boss Slot says Ekitike reaping rewards for greater physicality . The 23-year-old scored on his first three appearances after joining from Eintracht Frankfurt . Alexander Isak signed for Liverpool for £125 million ($169 million)

Title: US airstrike in Sokoto is indictment of Nigeria’s govt – CUPP
Summary: President Bola Tinubu-led administration has once again proven that it is incapable of dealing with Nigeria’s internal security challenges . CUPP said while the precision strike was welcomed, it exposes the fact that the President . Bola Tinubu . administration has failed to deal with Nigeria's internal . security challenges,

Title: Army warns against fake DSSC recruitment advertisement
Summary: Nigerian Army warns against fake DSSC recruitment advertisement . Recruitment advertisement circulating on social media claiming to be available . The advert claims that the “Direct Short Service Course (DSSC) 29 Application Form 2026” is available .

Title: Shettima vows security boost for Borno bomb blast survivors
Summary: Shettima vows security boost for Borno bomb blast survivors . “Most importantly, we are united in victory as well as in challenges. We are one nation, tied to a common destiny,” he said .
